Package jsymbolic2.processing

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AceConversion
    General conversion class from ACE XML to ARFF or CSV that should only be called statically.
    AceConversionPaths
    A convenience state class to hold the state of converted files for jSymbolic if necessary.
    AceToArffAndCsvTest
    Unit Tests for the AceConversion class.
    FeatureConversion
    A convenience class to allow features to be converted from one format to another.
    FeatureExtractorAccess
    A central access point to obtain all feature information, where features are accessible in the correct order with respect to the boolean array for features to save.
    FileValidator
    Checks if File input is valid with respect to files in MusicFileFilter.java.
    FileValidatorTest
    Unit tests for the FileValidator class.
    MIDIFeatureProcessor
    This class is used to pre-process and extract features from MIDI recordings.
    MIDIIntermediateRepresentations
    Objects of this class take in the path of a MIDI file when they are constructed and automatically parse the file.
    MusicFileFilter
    A file filter to check if either the midi or mei extensions are given when validating input files by their extensions.
